scripts.commit: npm run lint && npm run test && git add . && git-cz
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.docker: concurrently "cd backend && npm run npm run docker:composeredis" "cd backend && npm run docker:compose" "cd frontend && npm run docker:compose"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
